What are DHA and EPA?

WPI is also low in lactose and easy on your digestive tract.       Are protein shakes “good” for you?   Protein shakes can be an excellent addition to a well-rounded diet and healthy lifestyle. Research has shown that supplementing with protein can support athletic performance, post-workout recovery, weight management, muscle maintenance, and muscle growth.       Can protein shakes support weight gain?   Protein shakes may support weight gain if they contribute to a calorie surplus in your diet.       Can protein shakes support weight loss?   Research has shown that protein-rich foods temporarily rev up your metabolism and can help make you feel satiated longer, which may contribute to weight loss.       Are protein shakes "good" for women?   Supplementing with protein is as beneficial for women as it is for men in supporting muscle growth and maintenance, recovery, and performance.       How can protein supplements benefit my muscles?   Protein supplements provide the nutrients your body needs to stimulate muscle protein synthesis and support recovery post-workout.       Who Would Benefit from Taking Protein?      
  • Athletes and fitness enthusiasts looking to support muscle growth, muscle maintenance, performance, and post-workout recovery
  • Individuals with weight management goals seeking a lower-calorie, high-protein option
  • Older adults who require more protein to maintain muscle mass and overall health
  • Busy professionals and students who need a quick and convenient source of protein on the go

Not a fan of powders or swallowing pills? Animal Creatine Chews are a great-tasting alternative. These grab-and-go chewable tablets are easy and convenient and can effortlessly be tossed in a bag or taken quickly before you head out the door for the day or the gym. NOT JUST FOR BUILDING MUSCLE AND STRENGTH While creatine monohydrate is known for its role in helping increase muscle mass and strength, there are even more benefits that can be achieved by including it in your supplement regimen.   WHAT ANIMAL CUTS® IS Ripped & peeled. That's what Animal Cuts is all about. Dedicated to serious nutrition for the serious athlete. The complete Cutting Stack
  • Thermogenic
  • Nootropic
  • Diuretic
  • Metabolic
  • Thyroid
  • Cortisol Inhibitors
  • CCK Inhibitors
WHO WE ARE in 1983, Animal was founded with the birth of Animal Pak, the venerable training pack that started it all. Born from the real needs and desires of professional bodybuilders. Animal has grown prodigiously over the decades. Today, as yesterday, the name Animal stands for trust, integrity and a unique no nonsense approach to the game. Animal also represents a group of products that have stood the test of time, proven again and again in the labs, and in the trenches where it counts most!... The gym and the stage. Dedicated to serious nutrition for the serious athlete. Animal is your choice of champions. When you want to get shredded, a plain old fat burner won't do.  

Directions

Take two Animal Cuts packs everyday for three consecutive weeks. Follow a cycleconsisting of three weeks "on" and one week "off". After your one week off cycle, you can repeat another three week on cycle until you reach you goals. Take on an empty stomach. For optimal results, you can stack Animal Cuts with Animal Stak to achieve maximum lean mass and definition. Also consider adding Animal Pak to your supplement program, especially if you are on a "cut".

Warning

Not for use by individuals under the age of 18. Do not use if pregnant or nursing. Consult a physician before using this product especially if you have, or have a family history of, heart disease, thyroid disease, diabetes, high blood pressure, recurrent headaches, depression or other psychiatric conditions, glaucoma, difficulty in urinating, prostate enlargement, or seizure disorder, if you are using a monoamine oxidase inhibitor(MAOI) or any other dietary supplement, prescription drug or over-the-counter drug containing pseudoephedrine,ephedrine, or phenylpropanolamine(ingredients found in certain allergy, asthma, cough/cold, and weight loss products). Do not use if pregnant or nursing. If you are taking anti-depressants or other medication, consult with your healthcare professional before using this product. Use of this product may cause you skin to be extra sen-sitive to UV sources, such as artificial or natural sunlight. Avoid excessive exposures from these sources. Discontinue use two weeks prior to surgery. Each 1 pack contains 20mg of sunephrine and 200mg of caffeine.

You’re getting better with age, and looking forward to years of continued well-being. New Chapter's complete one-daily multivitamin for women 50 plus is expertly designed for you, packed with nutrients for immune, cellular energy, brain, eye, bone & breast health support, stress, mood, vision & digestive support, and healthy hair, skin & nails.* Enhance overall wellness and healthy aging with essential vitamins and minerals fermented with probiotics, and formulated for your body to recognize and absorb as food. Easily digestible and gentle even on an empty stomach! Here at New Chapter, we sustainably source the highest quality ingredients and craft with you and our planet in mind. That's what we call wellness, well done. IRON-FREE.   *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

One tablet daily. Can be taken anytime, even on an empty stomach.

As with any dietary or herbal supplement, you should advise your health care practitioner of the use of this product. If you are nursing, pregnant, or considering pregnancy, you should consult your health care practitioner prior to using this product. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Hydrate – Electrolyte Formula – Tropical Punch (0.69 lbs./40 Servings)
description:
About This Product

  • Provides hydration and supports exercise performance
  • Informed Choice certified
  • Naturally flavored and sugar-free
  • Non-GMO and free of gluten, artificial sweeteners, and artificial colorings
  • Tropical Punch flavor
    Stay hydrated throughout the day and during training with help from Hydrate. This refreshing electrolyte formula features minerals, taurine, SenActiv®, and coconut powder without added sugars, artificial coloring, or artificial sweeteners.       Frequently Asked Questions       What is taurine?   Taurine is a naturally occurring sulfonic acid that supports cellular hydration.       What is SenActiv?   SenActiv is a patented, clinically studied adaptogen complex that supports athletic performance and muscle recovery after intense exercise.       What does “bioavailable” mean?   When something is bioavailable, it means that it’s more readily absorbed and used by the body.  

Directions

As a dietary supplement, mix 1 scoop with approx. 12oz of water 1-2 times per day.

Warning

During your workout, it is recommended that you drink plenty of water to stay hydrated. NOT INTENDED FOR PERSONS UNDER THE AGE OF 18. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. Do not use if pregnant or nursing. Consult a healthcare professional prior to consumption if you are unaware of your current health condition, have any pre-existing medical conditions, or are taking any prescription medication. Reduce or discontinue use if sleeplessness, tremors, dizziness, nervousness, headaches, or heart palpitations occur. Improper use of this product will not improve results and is potentially hazardous to a person’s health. Store in a cool, dry place.
